artefact.overview: You need a licence to provide commercial television services in the UK
artefact.licence_short_description: Licence to provide commercial television services in the UK from Ofcom.
artefact.licence_overview:
To provide commercial television services in the UK, you need a licence from [Ofcom.](http://www.ofcom.org.uk/ "Ofcom"){:rel="external"} 

Programme content, advertising and transmission technical standards are all regulated as part of the licence agreement.

details.description: Applying for licences from your council for events and businesses
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.
